room_title: Escape room "British" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: We loved all the rooms here but the pirate and British were our favorite! Cells very close! Highly recommend and great customer service!

room_title: Escape room "British" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: Great attention to detail and puzzle flow. Best competition rooms in the state

room_title: Escape room "British" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: The owners were very engaged and provided an absolutely amazing experience for our group! We will definitely return. The competition rooms are amazing!

room_title: Escape room "British" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: We did the competition rooms and switched sides after! We love that you can complete both sides and they are unique! Definitely will return! Kid friendly location

room_title: Escape room "British" by Urban Escape Games in Atlanta
review: Totally immersive and excellently done! Good variety of rooms, including one for kids. Loved it!!!
